title: Flash FX Abstract Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 10 Abstract sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/6ST5epLV10Y


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 30 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Abstract 01_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Abstract 02_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Abstract 03_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Abstract 04_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Abstract 05_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Abstract 06_#[512,288].png 1536x1440

● Abstract 07_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Abstract 08_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Abstract 09_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Abstract 10_#[512,288].png 2048x1344


Number of Textures: 10

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
